name: Atlantic Mermaid Escape
description:
Hi, We are delighted to share our new game with you :)

Game Name: Atlantic Mermaid Escape

Description:   Find objects to solve puzzle code, beat each level by unlocking the mysterious challenge and save the Atlantic mermaid. Good Luck and have Fun!

Game Page: http://www.freeroomescape.com/atlantic-mermaid-escape/

Walkthrough: 

Thanks for supporting our game, we will continue to make more fun and addicting free games :)

Cheers,

Free Room Escape
